text.div:
HospitalNotificationTestscripts

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://medcomfhir.dk/ig/hospitalnotificationtestscript/ImplementationGuide/medcom.fhir.dk.testscripts.hospitalnotification

Testscripts for HospitalNotification v. 3.0.0

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-emer-01
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, message is corrected due to incorrect hospital department

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-emer-02
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, message is corrected due to incorrect time of admission

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-emer-imp-01
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted as emergency, patient is admitted as inpatient, patient is discharged

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-01
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, patient is registered as being on leave, patient returns from leave, patient is discharged

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-02
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, patient is registered as being on leave, patient doesn't return from leave, patient is discharged

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-03
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, patient is registered as being on leave, patient returns from leave, patient is registered as dead

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-04
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, 'patient is registered as being on leave, patient returns from leave', ' to ' x 2

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-05
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, message is corrected due to incorrect hospital department

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-imp-06
resource.description: Receive: Patient is admitted, message is corrected due to incorrect time of admission

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-01
resource.description: Receive dublicate: Patient is admitted, doesn't get acknowledged, patient is admitted

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-02
resource.description: Receive: Receive cancellation of admit patient: Patient is admitted, correction of admit patient and cancellation admit patient

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-03
resource.description: Receive: Messages received in wrong order: Patient is admitted as emergency, patient is discharged, patient is admitted as inpatient.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-04
resource.description: Receive: Receive a message with different timezones (+01:00 and +02:00): Patient is admitted in one timezone, patient is discharged in a different timezone.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-05
resource.description: Receive: Receive a message on the 29th of February 2024 (leap year): Patient is admitted on the date of leap year

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-receive-tec-06
resource.description: Receive: Receive a message where the serviceprovider is different from the sender: Patient is admitted

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-emer-01
resource.description: Send: Register patient as acute ambulant, correct message due to incorrect hospital department

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-emer-02
resource.description: Send: Register patient as acute ambulant, correct message due to incorrect time of admission.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-emer-imp-01
resource.description: Send: Register patient as acute ambulant, admit patient (inpatient), discharge patient

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-01
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, register patient as being on leave, register patient as returned from leave, discharge patient.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-02
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, register patient as being on leave, patient doesn't return from leave, discharge patient.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-03
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, register patient as being on leave, patient returns from leave, patient dies

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-04
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, *register patient as being on leave, patient returns from leave*, * to * x2

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-05
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, correct message due to incorrect hospital department. Evaluation is based on SOR number.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-imp-06
resource.description: Send: Admit patient, correct message due to incorrect time of admission.

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-tec-01
resource.description: Send: Cancel a corrected admission: Admit patient, correct admit patient and cancel admit patient

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-tec-02
resource.description: Send: Send a message on the 29th of February 2024 (leap year)

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-tec-03
resource.description: Send: Send dublicate: Admit patient, doesn't get acknowledged, send admit patient. IDs are handled correct

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_PF-send-tec-04
resource.description: Send: Admit patient and End hospital stay in different timezones. Correct use of timezone of summertime (+02:00) and vintertime (+01:00).

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-MORS
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Deceased - is dead at arrival to the hospital

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-MORS-emer
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Deceased - deceased during acute ambulant

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-MORS-imp
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Deceased - deceased during hospital stay

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-MORS-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Deceased - deceased during a period of leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-SLHJ-emer
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-SLHJ-imp
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-SLOR
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation End leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-STAA
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Start hospital stay - acute ambulant

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-STIN
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Start hospital stay

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-AN-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Cancellation Start leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-MORS
resource.description: Receive: Deceased - is dead at arrival to the hospital

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-MORS-emer
resource.description: Receive: Deceased - deceased during acute ambulant

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-MORS-imp
resource.description: Receive: Deceased - deceased during hospital stay

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-MORS-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Deceased - deceased during a period of leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-MORS

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-MORS-emer
resource.description: Receive: Update Deceased - deceased during acute ambulant

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-MORS-imp
resource.description: Receive: Update Deceased - deceased during hospital stay

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-MORS-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Update Deceased - deceased during a period of leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-SLHJ-emer
resource.description: Receive: Update End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-SLHJ-imp
resource.description: Receive: Update End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-SLOR
resource.description: Receive: Update End leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-STAA
resource.description: Receive: Update Start hospital stay - acute ambulant

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-STIN
resource.description: Receive: Update Start hospital stay

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-RE-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Update Start leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-SLHJ-emer
resource.description: Receive: End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-SLHJ-imp
resource.description: Receive: End hospital stay - patient completed to home/primary sector

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-SLOR
resource.description: Receive: End leave

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-STIN
resource.description: Receive: Start hospital stay - admitted

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-STIN-A1
resource.description: Receive: Start hospital stay - admitted, without request for reportOfAdmission

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_receive-STOR
resource.description: Receive: Start leave

resource.description: Send: Cancellation Deceased - dead at arrival to the hospital

resource.name: HospitalNotification_TestScript_AN_MORS-IMP
